title: Request: AP version of QSS
body: Since I only play Viktor it's really annoying when I vs a cassiopeia or vayne for example and I can't cleanse their stuns. I don't want to buy a QSS because I'm losing an essential item of my build and it upgrades into an AD item. It's just an idea and it'd be very useful for us AP players. Thanks !

replies.body: AD get QSS AP get Zhonyas.

Option 1: Dodge the CC

Option 2: Buy zhonyas and use this to dodge the CC and/or avoid a lot of their burst

Option 3: Buy QSS anyway, the lack of an upgrade is only a problem once you are full build, at which point it can be sold for something better (or upgraded if AD isn't completely useless on your champion, but thats not really relevant for Viktor)

Option 4: Take cleanse as your other summoner spell if you can see the enemy team has a large amount of unavoidable CC

I think an AP version of QSS would be kinda broken since the counterplay to a lot of high burst AP champs is to CC them and kill them before they can use their spells. If they can just QSS the CC and use their burst anyway it would make some champs alot harder to play against

Sure, lets just delete Warwick, Malzahar, Zed, Lissandra, Annie, Cassiopeia, Galio..... You know what ill stop there, i think its pretty clear why AP should not have a QSS, sit the fuck down and think for a minute on why that is, after five years of not having a QSS for AP you still ask for it.
Vayne only stuns if you hit a wall. Cassiopeia only stuns if you are facing her. I am just letting you know, because it could help.
